Literature.Title: Semisynthetic Macrocyclic Lipo-lanthipeptides Display Antimicrobial Activity Against Bacterial Pathogens.
Literature.Author: Zhao X, Xu Y, Viel JH, Kuipers OP

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 15975(MIC=4µM),Enterococcus faecium LMG 16003(MIC=4µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=2µM),Shigella flexneri ATCC 29903(MIC=2µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=4µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=8µM)
